roleset.name: make lighter

example.name: transitive
example.text: His being and His will -- Stevie could not divide God from his Papa -- illumined every parish face , turned the choir into a band of angels , and the pulpit into the tollgate to Heaven .

roleset.note: ILLUMINE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'illumine' based on sentences in brown. (from illumine.01-v predicate notes)
